Text: I made a new one to fix the 99% problem on the early ones. Enjoy! Gna.
GREAT!  God bless you! for sharing this fantastic movie!  Thanks!!!
Note to perspective leechers: there are no subtitles, so you're going to have to bone up on yr Japanese.

If the film leaves an ambivalent taste, you can blame it on the 100-minute cut of the original (it was 265 minutes long). The movie is still very long at 166 min, but even Kurosawa didn't like the final cut. The original version is lost.
Jungleboogie - don't be silly, do some research before making silly comments. :)

LezDawson - Silly, but funny : )
Pity the original cut is lost.
